content: Medium asked me to apply as a writer, but I didn’t know what to put as my price per article. I didn’t realize most writers put per word, I put $3 as a total amt per article, thinking this was really low balling it. Turns out, I may have said too much. I am not a paid writer on Medium but it seems some have reached that status — hooray for them. They are even more prolific than one could imagine, writing 2–4 articles a day! And they write articles and essays, not fiction like me (I didn’t see anyone in that genre, but maybe I’m wrong). I’ll keep writing regardless. I don’t write here with the expectation of money, I write because I have to — kinda’ like you, eh? We write because we write. It makes us who we are.
